snippet: Detroit Manager Jim Leyland wanted to shake things up when he moved Miguel Cabrera into the second spot in the batting order, but it was also a statistically sound decision.
abstract: Keeping Score column notes that decision by Detroit Tigers manager Jim Leyland to have slugger Miguel Cabrera bat second was intended to shake things up, but it was also a statistically sound move.
lead_paragraph: Detroit Manager Jim Leyland wanted to shake things up when he moved Miguel Cabrera into the second spot in the batting order, but it was also a statistically sound decision.

headline.main: Reasoning May Be Wrong, but No. 2 Spot Is for Best
headline.print_headline: Reasoning May Be Wrong, But No. 2 Spot Is for Best
